name: Frost Investment Advisors
overview: Frost Investment Advisors, LLC is a privately owned investment manager. The firm provides its services primarily to investment companies. It manages equity, fixed income, and balanced mutual funds for its clients. The firm also serves banking institutions, commingled funds, pension and profit sharing plans, and other pooled investment vehicles. It invests in the public equity markets of the United States. The firm operates as a subsidiary of Frost National Bank. Frost Investment Advisors, LLC was founded in 2007 and is based in San Antonio, Texas.

milestones.description: Frost Investment Incorporates Hedge Fund Advantages into New Mutual Fund
milestones.source_description: Frost Investment Incorporates Hedge Fund Advantages into New Mutual Fund
